metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1000420 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - untriaged.
metadata.Description:
Syncthing version 0.14.33 and older is vulnerable to symlink traversal resulting in arbitrary file overwrite

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000420` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

syncthing - 0.14.43+ds1-6
syncthing-discosrv - 0.14.43+ds1-6
syncthing-relaysrv - 0.14.43+ds1-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: syncthing package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.14.43+ds1-6').
